resources.string:
Hi my name is mahan. 

I love video games and reading books. 
I am also interested in android native development and making games. 
I finished The witcher3, Batman trilogy, The last of us(part 1), DMC and etc. 

At this time i'm 21 and already know this concepts: 
Basics of programming like Flowchart, algorithms, DS, Basic knowledge of Os and practical skills like: 
Java Core, Junior Programmer in Unity and Be familiar with Android Basics. 
And when it's come to Android i also have to mention that i know the basics of Kotlin very well and wrote many easy-hard programs with it that you can find them in my GitHub account. 

Beside them i Read these books about Kotlin to extend my knowledge of it: 
"Head First Kotlin" and "Kotlin Programming by Big Nerd Ranch Company". 
I hope i introduce my self very well and not boring you my friend. see ya.
